landing.heroTitle: Find the best deals before the competition
landing.heroSubtitle: Monitor listings for iPhones, cars, real estate and more on OLX, Mercado Livre and Facebook. Get real-time alerts and be the first to close the deal.
landing.featureIphoneDesc: Monitor used iPhone listings, grab the best prices before the competition and resell for profit.
landing.featureCarsDesc: Track vehicle listings in your area. Get instant alerts when a great deal appears.
landing.featureRealEstateDesc: Find properties below market price. Be the first to contact the seller.
landing.benefitAlerts: Alerts in seconds - Get notified via Telegram as soon as the listing is posted
landing.benefitMarketplaces: All marketplaces - OLX, Mercado Livre, Facebook Marketplace, Webmotors and more
landing.benefitFilters: Smart filters - Monitor by city, price range, keyword and more
landing.benefitProfit: Increase your profit - Be the first to the best deals and negotiate better
landing.benefitTrial: 7 days free - Try with no commitment. Cancel anytime
landing.benefitNoCatch: No hidden fees - Cancel from the app, no calls needed
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of sellers already using RadarOne to find the best opportunities. 7 days free, no credit card required.

wizard.title: Connect account ‚Äì {{site}}
wizard.intro: {{site}} requires login to show certain listings. For RadarOne to monitor for you, we need a Session File (.json).
wizard.noPassword: Your password is never requested or stored.
wizard.recommendedDesc: Simplest and most practical for most users.
wizard.step1Cookies: 1. Install a browser extension that exports cookies to JSON.
wizard.step1CookiesHint: Click to install from the Chrome Web Store:
wizard.step3Cookies: 3. Use the extension to export cookies as .json.
wizard.step4Cookies: 4. Upload the .json file in the area below.
wizard.autoDesc: Generates the file directly on your computer. You'll log in through a browser window; RadarOne doesn't see your password.
wizard.step1Auto: 1. Open the terminal and paste this command:
wizard.step2Auto: 2. Log in to {{site}} in the window that opens.
wizard.step3Auto: 3. Upload the generated sessao.json file in the area below.
wizard.dropHint: Drag the .json file here or click to choose
wizard.serverStartingDesc: The server may be starting up. The upload may take up to 60 seconds.
wizard.successDesc: Session saved with {{count}} cookies. Your monitors will now work automatically.

errors.serverUnavailable: Server temporarily unavailable. Try again shortly.

errors.rejected: The server rejected the file. Check if it's a valid session file.
errors.internalServer: Internal server error. Try again shortly.

validation.invalidJson: This file is not valid JSON. Check if you exported it correctly.
validation.emptyFile: The file is empty (no cookies found). Log in to {{site}} first.
validation.noCookiesFor: No {{site}} cookies found in this file. Make sure to export after logging in to {{url}}.
validation.unrecognizedFormat: Unrecognized format. The file must be a session JSON (.json).
validation.noCookiesField: Invalid file: "cookies" field not found. Check if you exported the correct file.
validation.noCookiesInFile: No cookies found in the file. Log in to {{site}} before exporting.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: It's a .json file that contains your browser's login data (cookies) after you log in to a site. With it, RadarOne can access the site as if it were you, without needing your password.
faq.a2: Yes. The file is encrypted with AES-256-GCM before being stored. We never ask for your password and you can revoke the session at any time by clicking "Remove".
faq.q3: When do I need to reconnect?
faq.a3: When the site requests login again (usually every 7-30 days) or when you change your password. RadarOne will notify you when necessary.
faq.q4: How to generate the Session File?
faq.a4: Click the "Connect account" button above. The wizard will show two options: generate automatically via terminal (recommended) or use a browser extension.

alerts.needsAttentionDesc: Reconnect expired, invalid, or accounts that need reauthentication to continue monitoring.
